data.eml:eml: The Hollandse Delta Water Authority manages a large area of 102,000 ha in the southwest of the province of Zuid-Holland. This is the area south of the Nieuwe Maas and the Noord, and also encompasses the (former) islands Goeree-Overflakkee, Hoeksche Waard, Voorne-Putten, the Eiland van Dordrecht, IJsselmonde, Rozenburg and Tiengemeten.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl32 records (March 2018)
